segments.text: Hi , Kathy . Have you had lunch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet . And I ’ m really hungry now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m starving , too . There is a new Chinese restaurant close by . Do you want to go there for lunch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s my treat this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I could eat a cow .
segments.speaker: S1
